item.title: Initial commit
item.description: Recently, I’ve given a short talk at DevOpsDays Florian√≥polis on Helm, Kubernetes de-facto release manager tool. I’ve aptly named it “What the Helm!?” (a play on words with “What the Hell!?”), and then gave myself a nice pat on the back. Still, being incapable of ever doing something original, I immediately found out that the joke had been published already. Twice. In this talk I’ve discussed a few Helm pitfalls, specially if you plan to use it for continuous delivery, like I have.
